description.full: This game supports English, Spanish, and French. Download the manual for this game by going to https://help.ea.com/en/tag/manuals and selecting your title from the Product drop down menu. In a city where information is heavily monitored, where crime is just a memory, where most people have sacrificed freedom for a comfortable life,           Some choose to live differently. Some. like you, are Runners, phenomenally agile messengers who deliver sensitive information for a price.           You are a Runner called Faith.           Murder has come to this city. And now you are being hunted. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
